Articles.Content: Does kmp work with mods that don't add parts like hyperedit
Jug: Yes, unfortunately. Don't use HyperEdit in KMP though, it ruins the challenge of beating other players to places.

Hi

I need a little bit of help with the server end. I am having trouble setting the IP binding properly to my PC and wireless.

Any way that I could get advice?

Hi

I need a little bit of help with the server end. I am having trouble setting the IP binding properly to my PC and wireless.

Any way that I could get advice?

You'll almost certainly will be fine using the default value "0.0.0.0"--you only need to bind an IP if you are using a large server with multiple IPs assigned to different purposes.

Edited November 8, 2013 by TehGimp666

Another possible way to add in for the Warp factor is that it only affects individual spaceships instead of using a sync. This could be a toggleable option for servers if they want to have a simpler warp system, though it'll be unrealistic.
How much bandwidth does this mod use. And awesome mod:D

Maybe some kind of docking mode could be added.

A button like the Sync next to the players name.(within 2,25km for example)

When selecting it gives both player names to select from on who is primary controller,

so when docked the controls go to him.

Both agree on same name if not docking mode is cancelled.

More to the reason for this mode would be to have both ships in sync with eachother.

Today again I tried with someone for hours to dock, and once close the numbers just dint look alike to eachother,

he was 80m and closing , I could see him at 230m and drifting away.

In the end he docked and I couldn't see it, and then it kicked me to VAB.(assuming its because once docked the computer sees it as 1 ship)

Just somehow keep the sync right between 2 vessels docking.

i really would like to see some autoreconnect because its just horrible if u want to do something and u just get u have been disconnect go back to main menu and reconnect
What is the problem with kerbals spazzing out? Or is it only on kerbin that happens?

we all are waiting till 0.1.4)

no bugs

only rocket rush mode)

Good evening everyone. First of all, I wish to tell the developer that this is an amazing mod. Just the idea of it is incredible and it's even more so that it worked. Unfortunately I am writing this to tell you of a problem I've encountered.

I am trying to build a small resupply station around Kerbin where my friends can dock up and refuel before heading out into the universe. And as I was about to dock the second piece onto it, I was unable to undock the RCS tug I keep on it. I have a kerbal in the tug itself and I press the undock button on the dockingport that is on the station side of the thing. But after I press it, nothing happens. The tug doesn't detach and the undock button disappears. I tried figuring out what is causing this to happen but the log system makes no sense to me. Debug mode doesn't change anything but adding each time my status changes.

I have installed the Kethane mod and allowed its parts. It may be due to that since I don't know how KMP would save the Kethane deposits and such. I fortunately did make a backup just before installing the Kethane mod so I can try reverting.

Another problem I also found was that sometimes when I enter the Tracking Station, I see ships that I've deleted already. Like it reverted back. But when I try to switch to them, it forces a resync with the server. This may also be related to Kethane. I suppose that if that is the case, then mods that add more than just parts, things that actually save to the "world space" won't function properly yet.

Enough of my rambling though! Awesome mod! Really excited to see where this is heading.
I used this again, but when I hit CTRL+V with the IP, the GUI broke like when it had a space in it, but this time I didn't even hit connect!

This happens to me with no mods installed. Dock 2 things together in orbit. Go to space center or disconnect, come back, go back to the station and you can no longer un-dock. It happens every time.

>>This happens to me with no mods installed. Dock 2 things together in orbit. Go to space center or disconnect, come back, go back to the station and you can no longer un-dock. It happens every time.

Next update fixes this.
so guys, 0.1.3 will be good playable, dev version 0.1.2-0.1.3 is nice )
yea? great news!

The latest dev builds has been the best builds by far. Server and client stability is no comparison to what 0.1.2.0 was. Far superior in every way. Even the database size on the server is 1/10th of what 0.1.2.0 was.
sounds promising
I see everyone talking about a version newer that 0.1.2.0..... is there a dev build out or is this just the next release?
We have been doing heavy testing to get the next build out of dev, with any luck it should be in the next few days.

I have a question.

While Im playing with my friend , he keeps disappearing back and forth from the player list even we tried to sync. Also, I've tried to look for him from the launch site on earth but we dont seem to see each other at all. We've played 3 hours so far but havent had a chance to see each others yet . I really want to see him and give him a High-five

im also having the same woes but it seems the devs have it nailed on the + side craft sharing, chat and screenshare all seem to work flawlessly... that and im having no connectivity issues what so ever between my server or joining other peoples
